entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:02 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 5:00 AM EST Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.0°C

Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -13

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
